name: etcher
description: Burn images to SD cards & USB drives, safely and easily.

features.title: Validated Burning
features.description: No more writing images on corrupted cards and wondering why your device isn't booting.

features.title: Hard Drive Friendly
features.description: Makes drive selection obvious to avoid wiping your entire hard-drive

features.title: Beautiful Interface
features.description: Who said burning SD cards has to be an eyesore.

features.title: Open Source
features.description: Made with JS, HTML, node.js and Electron. Dive in and contribute!

features.title: Cross Platform
features.description:
Works for everyone,
no more complicated install instructions.

features.title: More on the way
features.description:
50% faster burns, simultaneous writing for multiple drives.
View our roadmap
